title: Options menu is huge in game.
body:
Screen Resolution 2140x1440 27"

Just something I'd mention, not the end of the word, but when I open up the options menu in game it takes up all of the screen and makes it almost unreadable with my screen size.

[Example](http://i.imgur.com/6q1KURz.jpg)

Same thing happens with the shop

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not sure if this also applies to the options menu, but with the shop you can resize it by dragging from the bottom right corner.
Same problem, 2560x1440 27" and my menu options are HUGE.
